title: [BUG] Please add overload for "SKPath.AddPoly(points, count, isClosed)"
body:
### Description

Currently using 2.89 and this overload is missing.  The only one available looks like this:

	public unsafe void AddPoly(SKPoint[] points, bool close = true)

and internally makes this call:

       SkiaApi.sk_path_add_poly(Handle, points2, points.Length, close);

Instead of always setting PointCount = points.Length, we'd like to set this count ourselves.

Otherwise we have to recreate the SKPoint[] array every time the point count changes (which happens frequently).

SKIA supports it, so just asking that SkiaSharp adds this overload.

### Code

Want to change our call:
path.AddPoly(points, false);

to:
path.AddPoly(points, pointCount, false);


### Expected Behavior

Added support for this overload.

### Actual Behavior

This method is missing.

### Version of SkiaSharp

2.88.9 (Previous)

### Last Known Good Version of SkiaSharp

1.x (Obsolete)
